briefdescription.para: Count bits set to 1 from least significant bit.

simplesect.para: 0xFFFFFFFF if no bit was set to 1

briefdescription.para: Count bits set to 1 from most significant bit.

simplesect.para: 0xFFFFFFFF if no bit was set to 1

briefdescription.para: Convert the elapsed ticks to microseconds according to the source clock frequency.
Convert the elapsed ticks to milliseconds according to the source clock frequency.

memberdef.name: HPM_CHECK_RET
